Title: Once opposition dies, democracy is dead — Galadima
Summary: Alhaji Buba Galadima accuses the current political elite of dismantling dissent and tightening authoritarian control over the country’s institutions . Speaking after receiving a national recognition award from The Guardian Nigeria News - Nigeria and World News .

Title: Hisbah arrests seven suspected cross-dressers, seals popular Kano joint
Summary: Kano State Hisbah Board has arrested seven suspected cross-dressers during a late-night raid on a popular social joint in the city centre . The suspects were apprehended following an intelligence-led operation indicating alleged illicit activities at the establishment .

Title: Bandits kill kidnap victim after receiving ransom
Summary: Bandits kill kidnap victim after collecting ransom for his release . Mal Usman Buhari was kidnapped by bandits on Monday, September 29, 2025 .

Title: FIRS appoints Xpress Payment as official TSA collecting agent
Summary: Federal Inland Revenue Service appoints Xpress Payment Solutions as official TSA collecting agent . FIRS appoints Payment Solutions Limited as collecting agent under the Treasury Single Account (TSA) framework .

Title: Olubadan to promote Folarin, Lekan Alabi, Fijabi, others on Friday
Summary: Seven senior chiefs in the Otun Olubadan line would benefit from the promotion exercise slated for this Friday . The promotion exercise, to be presided over by the Ibadanland, Oba Rashidi Ladoja, will take place .

Title: Aganga, Anya, Akande, Aigbogun, others storm Lagos in National Interest
Summary: All roads will lead to MUSON Centre, Lagos, on Thursday, for the launch of Dr Olu Fasan's path-charting book, "In The National Interest: The Road to Nigeria's Political, Economic and Social Transformation"

Summary: Bitcoin first surpassed $100,000 in May before reaching its latest record of around $126,251 last month . The value of Bitcoin is plunging .

Summary: Guinea-Bissau is one of the poorest countries in the world, with more than 40 percent of its population living in extreme poverty .

Title: Enugu Senator dies in UK, Senate mourns
Summary: Senator Okey Ezea represented Enugu North Senatorial District and reportedly passed away in the United Kingdom while receiving medical treatment . Summary: Kwara State Governor, AbdulRahman AbdulRazaq, has called for urgent reinforcement of security in the Ekiti Local Government Area, particularly the Eruku axis, following a new wave of attacks in the community on Tuesday .
